Detailed Description

template<typename TYPE>
class zorder_traits< TYPE >

Contains traits used by the zorder_lt class.

zorder traits class

This is the unspecialzied version of this class, it must be specialized for each type that will be used for coordinates. Note: some of these are deprecated and will be removed

Member Function Documentation

template<typename TYPE>
static void zorder_traits< TYPE >::check_type (  )  [inline, static]

Checks if type is valid.

Check Type

This function checks if the type traits specialization exists. Prints an error and exits if this type does not have defined traits. Checked at creation of a zorder_lt object
